title: Build live-updating feed infrastructure with per-person source tracking
description: Build a data layer for the feed that: (1) tracks source URLs/RSS feeds for each directory member, (2) periodically checks for new publications/posts, (3) stores entries in a structured format (JSON or similar) that the static feed page can consume, (4) allows manual curation while also surfacing new content automatically. Consider: RSS aggregation, per-person source configs, publication type detection, deduplication.
